short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to make browsing Taobao easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a button to take you from Taobao mobile URLs to the desktop version. Useful for people who browse/bookmark Taobao items on mobile but then want to look at the pages on desktop.
